Summary: Bright orange light in sky, moved towards me and got brighter then turned and vanished into sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out walking my dog when i turned around outside my house and observed an oval orange light in the clear sky, i initially thought as always that it was a plane or helicopter, however the light was orange and steady which made me then think different, i started walking towards it and it got brighter and was slowly moving towards me, however it was still up in the sky, it then stopped and started retreating into the atmosphere and within 2 seconds it had turned into a pinhole in the sky and vanished. I have never experienced anything like this and it really has me thinking.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Edinburgh
There were no other sightings in Edinburgh on or around March 18th 2011
